00001 /*
00002  * SGP_GammaResponse.c
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 28.07.2009
00005  *      Author: greilich
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "SGP_GammaResponse.h"
00009 
00010 #include "SGP_Constants.h"
00011 #include <math.h>
00012 
00013 void SGP_gamma_response(        long*   n,
00014                                                         float*  d_Gy,
00015                                                         long*   gamma_model,
00016                                                         float*  gamma_parameter,
00017                                                         // return
00018                                                         float*  S){
00019 #ifdef _R
00020         int n_int = (int)(*n);
00021         *n = (long)n_int;
00022 
00023         int gamma_model_int = (int)(*gamma_model);
00024         *gamma_model = (long)gamma_model_int;
00025 #endif
00026         long    i,j;
00027         /*
00028          * (0) Testmodel, response m*x + c
00029          * parameters:  m - gamma_parameter[0]
00030          *                              c - gamma_parameter[1]
00031          */
00032         if(*gamma_model == GR_Test){
00033                 float   m       = gamma_parameter[0];
00034                 float   c       = gamma_parameter[1];
00035                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00036                         S[i]            =       m * d_Gy[i] + c;
00037                 }
00038                 return;
00039         }
00040         /*
00041          *  (1) General multi-hit, multi-target model
00042          *
00043          *  N.B.: In this case the array length IS NOT (*n_parameter) but 4*(*n_parameter) !!
00044          *
00045          *      4 * i parameters:       k               - relative contribution from component i (= Smax_i), preferably adding to 1 for all components (not mandatory though!)
00046          *                                              D1              - characteristic dose (one hit per target in average) of component i
00047          *                                              c               - hittedness of component i
00048          *                                              m               - number of targets for component i
00049          *      if 4*ith parameter (k_i == 0) -> end of parameter list
00050          **/
00051         long    n_gamma_parameter = 0;
00052         while   (gamma_parameter[n_gamma_parameter] != 0){
00053                 n_gamma_parameter       += 4;
00054         }
00055 
00056         if(*gamma_model == GR_GeneralTarget){
00057                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00058                         S[i]    = 0.0f;
00059                 }
00060                 for (j = 0; j < n_gamma_parameter / 4; j++){                                            // loop over all components
00061                         float k                 =       gamma_parameter[j * 4];
00062                         float D1                =       gamma_parameter[j * 4 + 1];
00063                         float c                 =       gamma_parameter[j * 4 + 2];
00064                         float m                 =       gamma_parameter[j * 4 + 3];
00065 
00066                         float tmp               =       0.0f;
00067 
00068                         for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00069                                 if(c == 1){                                                                             // in case of c = 1 use simplified, faster formula
00070                                         tmp                     =       1.0f - exp(-1.0f * d_Gy[i] / D1);
00071                                 }else{                                                                                  // for c > 1 use incomplete gamma function
00072                                         tmp                     =       gammp(c, d_Gy[i] / D1);
00073                                 }
00074 
00075                                 if(m == 1){                                                                             // in case of m = 1 do not use pow for speed reasons
00076                                         tmp                     *=      k;
00077                                 }else{
00078                                         tmp                     = k * pow(tmp, m);
00079                                 }
00080 
00081                                 S[i]            +=      tmp;
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 return;
00085         }
00086         /*
00087          *  (2) RL ACCUMULATED COUNTS MODEL
00088          *
00089          *      parameters:     Smax    - max. RATE signal (in contrast to model == 1, where Smax is the maximum response signal)
00090          *                              chi             - dynamics, ration between Smax and start count rate c0
00091          *                              D1              - characteristic dose at which rate signal reaches saturation
00092          *
00093          *                              are transformed into
00094          *
00095          *                              c0              - RATE signal at D = 0
00096          *                              B               - linear slope of RATE signal below D = D1
00097          *                              D1              - see above
00098          */
00099 
00100         if(*gamma_model == GR_Radioluminescence){
00101                 float Smax              =       gamma_parameter[0];
00102                 float D1                =       gamma_parameter[1];
00103                 float chi               =       gamma_parameter[2];
00104                 // transform parameters
00105                 float c0                =       Smax / chi;
00106                 float B                 =       (Smax - c0) / D1;
00107 
00108                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00109                         if(d_Gy[i]      <= D1){
00110                                 S[i]            =       c0 * d_Gy[i] + 0.5f * B * d_Gy[i] * d_Gy[i];}
00111                         else{
00112                                 S[i]            =       c0 * D1 + 0.5f * B * D1 * D1 + Smax * (d_Gy[i] - D1);}
00113                 }
00114                 return;
00115         }
00116 
00117         /*
00118          *  (3) EXPONENTIAL-SATURATION MODEL, obsolete
00119          *
00120          *      parameters:     Smax    - max. response signal
00121          *                              D1              - characteristic dose at which rate signal reaches saturation
00122          */
00123         if(*gamma_model == GR_ExpSaturation){
00124                 // exp-saturation model
00125                 float   Smax    =       gamma_parameter[0];
00126                 float   D0              =       gamma_parameter[1];
00127 
00128                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00129                         S[i]            =       Smax * (1.0f - (float)exp(-1.0f * d_Gy[i] / D0));
00130                 }
00131                 return;
00132         }
00133 
00134         /*
00135          *  (4) LINEAR-QUADRATIC MODEL
00136          *
00137          *      parameters:     alpha   - 1st parameter in equation SF = exp( - alpha *D^2 - beta *D)
00138          *                              beta    - 2nd parameter in equation SF = exp( - alpha *D^2 - beta *D)
00139          *                              D0              - 3rd parameter - transition-dose
00140          */
00141         if(*gamma_model == GR_LinQuad){
00142                 // exp-saturation model
00143 
00144 
00145                 float   alpha   =       gamma_parameter[0];
00146                 float   beta    =       gamma_parameter[1];
00147                 float   D0              =       gamma_parameter[2];
00148 
00149                 if( alpha < 0 )
00150                         alpha = 0;
00151                 if( beta < 0 )
00152                         beta = 0;
00153 
00154                 for (i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00155                         if( d_Gy[i] < D0 ){
00156                                 S[i]            =       expf( -alpha * d_Gy[i] - beta * d_Gy[i] * d_Gy[i]);
00157                         } else {
00158                                 S[i]            =       expf(  -alpha * D0 - beta * D0 * D0 - ( alpha + 2 * beta * D0) * (d_Gy[i] - D0) );
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161                 return;
00162         }
00163 
00164         return;
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 void SGP_get_gamma_response(    long*   n,
00169                                                                 float*  d_Gy,
00170                                                                 float*  dd_Gy,
00171                                                                 float*  f,
00172                                                                 float*  f0,
00173                                                                 long*   gamma_model,
00174                                                                 float*  gamma_parameter,
00175                                                                 // return
00176                                                                 float*  S,
00177                                                                 float*  S_HCP,
00178                                                                 float*  S_gamma,
00179                                                                 float*  efficiency)
00180 {
00181 #ifdef _R
00182         int n_int = (int)(*n);
00183         *n = (long)n_int;
00184 
00185         int gamma_model_int = (int)(*gamma_model);
00186         *gamma_model = (long)gamma_model_int;
00187 #endif
00188 
00189         long i;
00190 
00191         SGP_gamma_response(     n,
00192                                                 d_Gy,
00193                                                 gamma_model,
00194                                                 gamma_parameter,
00195                                                 // return
00196                                                 S);
00197 
00198         *S_HCP                  =       0.0f;
00199         float D_gamma   =       0.0f;
00200 
00201         for(i = 0; i < *n; i++){
00202                         D_gamma         +=      d_Gy[i] * dd_Gy[i] * f[i];
00203                         *S_HCP          +=      S[i] * dd_Gy[i] * f[i];
00204         }
00205 
00206         i       = 1;
00207         SGP_gamma_response(     &i,
00208                                                 &D_gamma,
00209                                                 gamma_model,
00210                                                 gamma_parameter,
00211                                                 // return
00212                                                 S_gamma);
00213 
00214         *efficiency             =       *S_HCP / *S_gamma;
00215         return;
00216 }
